vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the Interlocal Agreement (ILA) with the City of Duncanville to add the construction, operation and maintenance of a new signal at Clark Road and Summit Parc Drive to the City of Dallas’ responsibility to the traffic control operations and maintenance agreement for traffic signal services, traffic signal maintenance services, and electricity costs for the traffic signals located on the boundary between the City of Dallas and the City of Duncanville ILA - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the Interlocal Agreement (ILA) with the City of Duncanville to add the construction, operation and maintenance of a new signal at Clark Road and Summit Parc Drive to the City of Dallas’ responsibility to the traffic control operations and maintenance agreement for traffic signal services, traffic signal maintenance services, and electricity costs for the traffic signals located on the boundary between the City of Dallas and the City of Duncanville ILA - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
